name: AudioUnitParameterNameInfo
desc: A short version of the name for an audio unit parameter.

items.name: init(inID: AudioUnitParameterID, inDesiredLength: Int32, outName: Unmanaged<CFString>?)
var inDesiredLength: Int32
items.desc: When setting an audio unit property that uses this data structure for its value, the maximum length that you are specifying for the audio unit parameter name.

items.name: var inID: AudioUnitParameterID
items.desc: The identifier for the audio unit parameter.

items.name: var outName: Unmanaged<CFString>?
items.desc: When getting an audio unit property that uses this data structure for its value, the short version of the parameter name provided by the audio unit. The host application then owns the string and is responsible for releasing it.
